name: Tomasz Lee
profile_summary: Results-driven Senior Test Engineer with 9+ years of experience in Automated Testing and Test Development, ensuring high-quality deliverables in compliance with industry standards like **IEC 62304**, **ISO 14971**, and **FDA Regulations**. Proficient in utilizing tools such as **Git**, **Perforce**, **Jenkins**, and **Bamboo** to streamline testing processes and enhance collaboration across teams. Strong background in both manual and automated testing methodologies, leading to effective Test Plans, Test Execution, and quality assurance. Adept at problem-solving and implementing innovative testing strategies to optimize product performance and reliability.

experience.responsibilities:
Applied **Automated Testing** methodologies to enhance software reliability and compliance with **IEC 62304** and **ISO 14971** standards, ensuring adherence to **FDA Regulations**.
Designed comprehensive **Test Plans** and executed **Test Development** strategies, resulting in a **30%** improvement in defect detection during early stages of development.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to facilitate effective **Test Execution**, leveraging **Git** and **Perforce** for version control and integration.
Utilized **Jenkins** and **Bamboo** for setting up continuous integration and delivery pipelines, streamlining the testing process and reducing review cycles by **25%**.
Implemented manual and automated test strategies, focusing on thorough verification and validation techniques to ensure the robustness of the products.
Demonstrated strong **Problem Solving** skills by troubleshooting and debugging software issues, leading to a **15%** reduction in testing turnaround time.
Fostered a collaborative work environment, enhancing communication among team members and stakeholders, thereby improving overall testing effectiveness.
Utilized **Xcode** and **Python** for developing and executing tests, contributing to a more automated and efficient testing framework.

Conducted **Automated Testing** and **Manual Testing** for iOS applications using **Xcode**, ensuring compliance with **FDA Regulations** and standards like **IEC 62304** and **ISO 14971**.
Developed comprehensive **Test Plans** and executed tests for applications, leading to a 20% increase in software reliability.
Utilized **Jenkins** and **Bamboo** for implementing CI/CD pipelines, which reduced build and deployment time by **25%**.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to gather requirements and define acceptance criteria, enhancing product feature delivery timelines by **15%**.
Managed version control with **Git** and **Perforce**, maintaining a seamless workflow and code integrity for multiple projects.
Implemented test development strategies that increased bug detection rates by **30%** through rigorous testing procedures.
Provided mentorship and training to junior testers, fostering a collaborative environment and reducing onboarding time by **40%**.
Set up an automated reporting system for test results using popular frameworks, improving transparency and communication among team members.
Utilized strong **Problem Solving** skills to troubleshoot and resolve complex testing issues, ensuring timely release cycles.

Executed comprehensive **Automated Testing** strategies to ensure software quality, employing **Jenkins** for continuous integration and delivery, resulting in a **30%** reduction in release cycle time.
Developed **Test Plans** and executed **Test Development** initiatives in alignment with **IEC 62304** and **ISO 14971** standards, ensuring compliance with **FDA Regulations** for safety-critical software.
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to promote **Collaboration** and knowledge sharing, facilitating successful project execution and proactive **Problem Solving**.
Utilized **Python** scripts for automating test executions, improving operational efficiency by **25%** through optimized testing processes.
Leveraged **Git** and **Perforce** for version control to enhance team productivity and streamline code management in various testing phases.
Participated in code reviews and design discussions to uphold coding standards and deliver robust test coverage, contributing to **4** major product releases per quarter.
Conducted **Manual Testing** in addition to automated scripts, ensuring comprehensive test coverage across **iOS** platforms using **Xcode**.
Facilitated the creation of user guides for testing protocols, improving onboarding processes for new team members by **15%**.
